qoutes.text: So, today and every day, I choose you. I choose to love you, to stand by you, and to dream with you
Today, on Propose day, I just want to tell you, that my heart is not just mine anymore - it's yours, forever and always.
I was alone in life, but when you came into my life, and my heart knew it had found a safe home.
You are my safe haven, my happiness, my forever.
No matter where life takes us, through every high and low, my love for you will remain constant and endless.

propose.text: Will you keep my heart as yours, now and forever? <3
propose.subtext: That's all I will wait for your reply
